齹字的基本解释

齹
cī
牙齿参差不齐。

齹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cuó］
［《廣韻》昨何切，平歌，從。］
牙齿参差。引申为残缺。参见“齾齹”。

齹字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【齒字部】　齹； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页1535第24
〔古文〕?【唐韻】楚宜切，音差。【說文】齒參差。　又【廣韻】昨何切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】才何切，?音醝。【玉篇】齒齹跌者。【正韻】齒不齊也。　又【正韻】齹，齒本。　又人名。【左傳·昭十六年】子齹賦野有蔓草。【杜註】子齹，子皮之子嬰齊也。　又【集韻】仕知切，音鮆。又倉何切，音蹉。義?同。

齹字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
齹字的起名意思

暂无。

齹
Basic explanation of words
齹
cī
The teeth are ragged.
齹
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [cuó]
["Guangyun" He cut yesterday, Ping Ge, from. ]
The teeth are jagged. Extended to be incomplete. See "齾齹".
齹
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Tooth Word Department] 　齹; Kangxi strokes: 25; page number: page 1535 24
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] Chu Yi cut, the sound difference. [Said the text] The teeth are jagged.　[Guang Yun] How did you cut yesterday [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Why did you cut it? 【Jade articles】Those who have fallen teeth. [Zheng Yun] The teeth are also missing.　[Zheng Yun] 齹, tooth base.　Another name. [Zuo Zhuan·Shao Sixteenth Year] Ziku Fu has creepers in the wild. [Note to Du] Zi Ku, Zipi's son Ying Qi also.　[Jiyun] Shi Zhiqie, the sound is good. He cut it again, the sound was wasteful. Righteous? Same.
齹

Name meaning

chī
неровный, кривой (о зубах)
